data.what_is: LeadLovers is a sales automation and digital marketing platform.
data.product_description: LeadLovers is a sales automation and digital marketing platform.

plan_features:
Acquisition
 5.000 leads (Talk to us if you need to add more leads to your database)
Page Builder
 Page templates
Forms
 Facebook Lead Ads
 Unlimited shipping e-mail
 Lead Tracking (leadlovers Pixel),      Engagement
 E-mail automation - conditional trigger
 Sales funnel
(strategies of online sales)
 SMS Marketing
(Text Messaging Package - purchased separately)
E-learning
 Members area

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadLovers?
A Plataforma e completa, nela eu consico criar landing pages, fazer disparo de emails e fazer a gestao da minha base de emails.

What do you dislike about LeadLovers?
Acho que o preco um pouco alto e a plataforma tem muitos termos diferentes das plataformas habituais de automacao de mkt.

What problems is LeadLovers solving and how is that benefiting you?
A plataforma funciona bem, e atende ao resquisitos basicos para uma estrategia de automacao de marketing

initial_reviews.review_title: Lead Lovers - My first e-mail marketing tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadLovers?
The intuitive tools are the best part from Lead Lovers. When I started with them I had no experience in this type of tools and it worked very well and they have all the integrations I needed for the moment.

What do you dislike about LeadLovers?
The downside was the fails in mail delivery. Side by side with bigger platforms the delivery amount of mail was low and my business was depending a lot on that.

Recommendations to others considering LeadLovers:
If you need a package of solutions for your business and have low budget, LeadLovers is the platform

What problems is LeadLovers solving and how is that benefiting you?
First of all, I was needing both a e-mail marketing tool and a platform which I could upload my paid content and manage the users at the same time. I think its exactly the Lead Lovers purpose, so it made me really satisfied.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadLovers?
Well it allows the users hassle free market to make website/landing page and also allow the automation of the marketing process from emails to chatbots and sales funnel, Even beginners can do work on it

What do you dislike about LeadLovers?
Well some limitations are that unless you have a good number of existing customers platforms feel quite expensive and building pages don't have host of features

What problems is LeadLovers solving and how is that benefiting you?
Taking clients businnes to next level and bring automaticity to their business,
